qa_pairs.question: What positions has J. Thomas Hill held at Vulcan Materials Company and the U.S. Chamber of Commerce, and when did he assume the role of CEO at Vulcan?
qa_pairs.answer: <statement>J. Thomas Hill is the chief executive officer of Vulcan Materials Company.<cite>[S5]</cite></statement> <statement>He succeeded Donald M. James as its chief executive officer and president in July 2014.<cite>[S12]</cite></statement> <statement>Hill served on the board of directors of the U.S. Chamber of Commerce.<cite>[S13]</cite></statement> <statement>Hill worked for Vulcan Materials Company from 1979 to 1990 and returned in 1996, later assuming the role of CEO.<cite>[S9][S10]</cite></statement>
qa_pairs.chunk:
Passage 1:
[S1] J. [S2] Thomas Hill


# J. [S3] Thomas Hill



**James Thomas Hill** (born c. [S4] 1959) is an American businessman. [S5] He is the chief executive officer of Vulcan Materials Company. [S6] ## Early life

Hill was born circa 1959. [S7] He graduated from the University of Pittsburgh. [S8] ## Career

Hill worked for the Vulcan Materials Company from 1979 to 1990, and Redlands Stone Products from 1990 to 1996. [S9] He returned to Vulcan Materials in 1996. [S10] He succeeded Donald M. [S11] James as its chief executive officer and president in July 2014. [S12] Hill serves on the board of directors of the U.S. [S13] Chamber of Commerce.
